title: Eddie Jones has to sound positive about France cancellation but England risk losing sharpness and rhythm
text:
I see Eddie Jones is saying the typhoon gods have smiled on England with the cancellation of their match against France but I’m not so sure. If I was the England coach, I think I’d prefer to be playing a match this weekend than having a weekend off.

Eddie is talking about it being like another pre-season; a chance for England's players to relax and refocus. But that’s why you have a pre-season in the first place.

Pre-season is a chance to work on tactical and technical aspects. We’re well past that stage now. We are in the middle of a tournament. England don’t want to have to warm up again, they want to be coming to the boil. They have already spent the best part of four months together. You...
description: I see Eddie Jones is saying the typhoon gods have smiled on England with the cancellation of their match against France but I’m not so sure.
